name: Datong
title: Datong - Traveling China like your home yard
overview: Datong is a historic city in Shanxi Province, famous for its ancient Buddhist grottoes and rich cultural heritage. Known for the UNESCO World Heritage Yungang Grottoes and the remarkable Hanging Temple built into a cliff face, Datong offers a glimpse into China's Buddhist art and architecture from the Northern Wei Dynasty.

highlights.attractions: Yungang Grottoes (UNESCO World Heritage), Datong Ancient City Wall (Ming Dynasty), Nine Dragon Screen (ancient glazed tile mural), Huayan Temple
highlights.cuisine: Datong Knife-cut Noodles (Dao Xiao Mian), Braised Lamb (Hong Shao Yang Rou), Shanxi Vinegar dishes, You Mian (oat noodles)
highlights.bestTime: Spring (April-May) and Autumn (September-October) with mild weather
